recipes.author: Jenni Garvins
recipes.instructions: Prepare your grill for indirect heating. Heat the grill to 350F degrees. Clean the potatoes, pat dry and place on a plate. With a fork, poke each potato 4 to 6 times. Coat each potato with olive oil (or any vegetable oil you are using).

recipes.author: Darren Fletcher
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with nonstick baking spray (I like the kind with flour in it) Set aside. In a large bowl whisk together the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.
